verses.verse: וְאֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh now these הָיוּ֙ <WH1961> ha-Yu become בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei Now these were the sons דָויִ֔ד <WH1732> do-Yid, of David אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who נֽוֹלַד־ <WH3205> no-lad- which were born ל֖וֹ lo בְּחֶבְר֑וֹן <WH2275> be-chev-Ron; unto him in Hebron הַבְּכ֣וֹר׀ <WH1060> hab-be-Chor the firstborn אַמְנֹ֗ן <WH550> 'am-Non, Amnon לַאֲחִינֹ֙עַם֙ <WH293> la-'a-chi-No-'am of Ahinoam הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֔ית <WH3159> hai-yiz-re-'e-Lit, the Jezreelitess שֵׁנִי֙ <WH8145> she-Ni the second דָּנִיֵּ֔אל <WH1840> da-ni-Yel, Daniel לַאֲבִיגַ֖יִל <WH26> la-'a-vi-Ga-yil of Abigail הַֽכַּרְמְלִֽית׃ <WH3762> Hak-kar-me-Lit. the Carmelitess

הַשְּׁלִשִׁי֙ <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi The third לְאַבְשָׁל֣וֹם <WH53> le-'av-sha-Lom Absalom בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מַעֲכָ֔ה <WH4601> ma-'a-Chah, of Maachah בַּת־ <WH1323> bat- the daughter תַּלְמַ֖י <WH8526> tal-Mai of Talmai מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king גְּשׁ֑וּר <WH1650> ge-Shur; of Geshur הָרְבִיעִ֖י <WH7243> ha-re-vi-'I the fourth אֲדֹנִיָּ֥ה <WH138> 'a-do-ni-Yah Adonijah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son חַגִּֽית׃ <WH2294> chag-Git. of Haggith

הַחֲמִישִׁ֥י <WH2549> ha-cha-mi-Shi The fifth שְׁפַטְיָ֖ה <WH8203> she-fat-Yah Shephatiah לַאֲבִיטָ֑ל <WH37> la-'a-vi-Tal; of Abital הַשִּׁשִּׁ֥י <WH8345> hash-shish-Shi the sixth יִתְרְעָ֖ם <WH3507> yit-re-'Am Ithream לְעֶגְלָ֥ה <WH5698> le-'eg-Lah by Eglah אִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <WH802> ish-To. his wife

שִׁשָּׁה֙ <WH8337> shish-Shah [These] six נֽוֹלַד־ <WH3205> no-lad- were born ל֣וֹ lo בְחֶבְר֔וֹן <WH2275> ve-chev-Ron, unto him in Hebron וַיִּ֨מְלָךְ־ <WH4427> vai-Yim-loch- and there he reigned שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> Sham, and there שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> She-va' seven שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> sha-Nim years וְשִׁשָּׁ֣ה <WH8337> ve-shish-Shah and six חֳדָשִׁ֑ים <WH2320> cho-da-Shim; months וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <WH7970> u-she-lo-Shim thirty וְשָׁלוֹשׁ֙ <WH7969> ve-sha-lo-Vosh and three שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> ma-Lach he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> bi-ru-sha-Lim. and in Jerusalem ס sa-Mek

וְנֹ֥גַהּ <WH5052> ve-No-gah And Nogah וְנֶ֖פֶג <WH5298> ve-Ne-feg and Nepheg וְיָפִֽיעַ׃ <WH3309> ve-ya-Fi-a'. and Japhia
